title: pongoLalUdutiha
sahitya:
pongoLalUdutiha yadukulOttunga 


anupallavi

  tingaLapAngane rajata shubhAnga


caraNam 1    salilacara dasharathanu iLedharOjjvala nEtra baliya bEDidanu bhrgu kuladi janisi 
balida billane muridu lalaneyara oLanAgi huLara sambOdhisida celuva hayavavErda
    caraNam 2    biDade nODida beTTadaDige bennanu koTTa aDavikiTe kaDu gOpi koDeya piDida 
koDalikara jaDe dharisi giDa kittu tA keDahi huDugiyara jAra saDagaradi tEjiyanErda
    caraNam 3    vAricara kUrmAvatAra sukara krUra dharaNiyanaLedu suraranu gelidu 
nIrajAkSiya tandu nArIpriya vratavaLidu Eridanu hayava purandara viTTala jagadoDeya
